remarks: Value of structure restriction.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
resvsca.r $e |- R = ( W |`v A ) $.
resvsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
resvsca.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
resvval $p |- ( ( W e. X /\ A e. Y ) -> R = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) $.
